article:
The tool takes all the content of the input jar files (including the class files, but also the other files packages in the jar files), and repackage them in the output jar file, repsecting the packages in which the files are present.
By default all the manifest properties of the input jar files will be added in the output jar file manifest. However the "Properties file" selector allows to specify a jar file specifying which manifest properties will be added in the output.
The properties Schema specifies the Schema of the Properties file.
The properties file has the following parent elements:
"Manifest": The Manifest content
"inputs": The list of input files
"output": The output file
"debug": The debug property
